revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=Verbatim |model=MediaShare |revision=(097159) |upc=023942971597 |asin=B003ES4NIA |newegg=N82E16822215049 |price=199 |est_release_date=06/2010 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |type=NAS enclosure, media streamer |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6192 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F2G08U0B-PCB0 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T1G084QQ-HCF7 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA II, eSATA, |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 20-pad header |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1),, J5 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=USB 2.0 High Speed 4-Port Hub Controller;JFD;FE1.1s;;1,,, Flash based 8-bit CMOS Microcontroller;Microchip;PIC16F690;;1;,,, 1MHz Dual Step-down Regulator;Marvell;88PG8227;;2;,,, Synchronous Switching Regulator Controller;Marvell;88PH8101;;1;,,, Dual N-Channel Power MOSFET;Farnell;AP4228GM;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery backup, |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux; |oui_eth=00:01:D2 }} ===See also=== *[[Verbatim PowerBay]] *[[Verbatim MediaShare]] (097159) • B003ES4NIA *[[Verbatim MediaShare Mini]] (97329) • B0047T7PTO *[[Verbatim MediaShare Wireless]] (98243) • B00CZ0P0PS *[[Verbatim MediaShare Wireless Mini]] (49160) • B01GVZ56T2
